html:
5.7.18  2:00 am   what sort of places would you like to play at on your tour?

      medium sized rooms that sound great

5.7.18  1:44 am   Make me laugh, please.

     do it to me first

5.7.18  1:40 am   I've noticed that many of your videos talk about going (or attempting to go) home, why?

      4.29.18  5:57 pm

5.7.18  12:21 am   what is who,

     someone

      and why am I where

     there is no no where. never was

5.6.18  10:52 pm   are you planning on making a video for got to know what's going on?

     yes but first i'm going to make new songs with videos and also go on tour and do many many other things

5.6.18  9:51 pm   paul mccartney has used medleys in his music over and over, like on abbey road, red rose speedway, venus and mars / rockshow, uncle albert / admeral halsey, hot as sun / glasses / suicide, etc. have you ever combined two songs and put a slash and made it groovy?

     no, i don't really like doing that

5.6.18  9:38 pm   what is new canaan based on?

     a trip to new canaan

5.6.18  8:26 pm   what is the main factor in deciding the bpm of a song

     where (when) you would tap your foot

5.6.18  7:41 pm   how tall is the average height

     medium

5.6.18  7:14 pm   Are we all computers in a way? 

     yes

5.6.18  6:40 pm   you ever just drink tomato soup at 1:34 in the morning listening to Africa by Toto

     that song has already been listened to way more than enough times to last until the end of every universe there could ever be. how about a different toto song

5.6.18  6:20 pm   What's your next song gonna be about?

     trousers

5.6.18  5:52 pm   which is better: O or 0?

     they are both horrible and terrible and i am mad at them

5.6.18  5:50 pm   how do you play chess

     put the king in checkmate

5.6.18  5:21 pm   what do i do when i ascend the mortal plane of existence

     try to ascend more. let's see how high this thing goes

5.6.18  5:21 pm   Do you have a prefered siege weapon?

     i don't really know what siege means

5.6.18  5:16 pm   is and the day goes on your 'answer' to got to know what's going going on?

     no. day goes on was actually written 1 year earlier

5.6.18  5:03 pm   I noticed you posted your youtube videos in 25 frames per second.  Isn't 25 frames per second a European standard?  

     i believe so

     Why not 30 frames per second?

     why not 25

5.6.18  4:35 pm   in one of your vines you say you find love outside the that mean the song outside is about you finding love

     freedom

5.6.18  4:16 pm   What's your opinion on the speed of light? Too fast? Not fast enough?

     just right

5.6.18  4:16 pm   do a crunk song

     every song is crunk

5.6.18  3:22 pm   What do you think of classifying people as either smart or dumb?

     seems dumb

5.6.18  3:19 pm   give a concert

     i will do it when i get a chance

5.6.18  3:08 pm   how to do the right thing at the wrong time?

     you will have to use a sort of fake-out maneuver

5.6.18  3:00 pm   What should I eat for dinner?

     lunch

5.6.18  2:39 pm   how do i know when i've made too much spaghetti

     if you start running out of space to put your other belongings

5.6.18  2:38 pm   how do you escape the music fbi

     flip it up, try being them

5.6.18  2:18 pm   Why are 2 & 4 called the "weak beats"?

     that is reverse psychology, so you'll make them strong

5.6.18  2:08 pm   How come you're so meticulous about cataloging the dates (and in some cases the times) of all your stuff? I get it for reality page, because that shows a specific progression of stuff you're going through or working on or thinking about.. But what about the scarmble page or improv, or jazz, etc? 

     time is very special to me. it is what makes everything possible

5.6.18  1:46 pm   how close are you to getting a tour together

     this close

5.6.18  1:19 pm   You never update your notebook page anymore.

     that's not true

      Still planning to add a few stuff there?

     yes but you probably won't notice

5.6.18  12:45 pm   how many eggs is too many eggs

     maybe like 14

5.6.18  11:06 am   When was the last time you operated a power tool?

     the mind is the most powerful tool

5.6.18  9:57 am   Is life a question its self? 

     it's many questions, and answers, then more questions usually

5.6.18  9:30 am   what are you going to do after you're done with the medium-length stuff

     i probably will never have time to finish all the medium length stuff i would like to do

5.6.18  8:57 am   5.4.18  9:04 pm Your 'war on theory' is so weird.  

     i'm not doing war i don't like war

     Music is just as made up as theory.  

     oh that's darn right

     And you've gotten it wrong anyway.  You're getting theory and convention confused, I guess?  

     i don't know what you mean

     Also, the music you make doesn't defy theory in any way, at all, ever.  

     my theory is that you can do anything in music, which is a theory that i try to embrace each and every day

     In fact, you very clearly have a theoretical base in Western pop music.  

     i have heard a lot of that music

     Ideas and concepts have been transferred to you, whether through deliberate study or not.  

     that's true

     And that's okay.  Just let it go.

     let what go

5.6.18  6:34 am   how would one escape the genre police? 

     evasive maneuvers and confusion tactics

5.6.18  5:13 am   how do I open a bag of chips

     first you must get inside the bag, with your mind

5.6.18  5:04 am   bill i lost my keys please help me

     did you check in the cabinet

5.6.18  4:53 am   is it pronounced gif or gif?

     gif

5.6.18  4:23 am   Do you think mustard can qualify for standalone beverage status? 

     sounds like someone is ready to take the *mustard challenge*

5.6.18  2:24 am   Am I a donkey?

     i don't think so but i have not ruled it out

5.6.18  1:20 am   who did you sell your soul to?

     myself

5.6.18  12:48 am   i'm cursed with swag

     sounds like it's time for a book tour

5.6.18  12:14 am   what's the coolest thing you know?

     object permenance

5.5.18  11:32 pm   do you have a soundcloud

     yes

5.5.18  11:16 pm   5.5.18  4:13 am   I am from the genre police, Starostin Division,

     oh hi

      hello. I would classify your music as Pop Rock, Meta Rock, and maybe Jazz or Folk Rock too, depending on the song. Pop Rock because of your stated hypnotic approach (where every moment is designed to hold interest), and Meta Rock because your music often feels like a parody of music itself (kinda like Ween or Frank Zappa). How would you escape from this classification,

     do something different

     and why?

     earn points

5.5.18  10:43 pm   have you gone back and watched any of your previous videos (for inspiration)

     not usually

     or do know all of them by heart

     not even close

5.5.18  10:32 pm   What do you consider poetry?

     i'll know it when i see it

5.5.18  10:04 pm   what is the darkness behind all of us?

     could be light
